title.rendered: Wendy Williams Somehow Slams Jessica Biel for What Justin Timberlake Did

content.rendered:
Reading Time: 3 minutes

Wendy Williams is a woman who allowed her husband to cheat on her for several years…

… until she had no choice but to file for divorce because it made her look back when he got another woman pregnant.

This fact seems like an important note of context to mention before delving into what Wendy Williams just said about Jessica Biel.

The polarizing talk show host spent a chunk of her show on Thursday offering up her unsolicited opinion on Justin Timberlake’s marriage to Biel.

This union has been in the news all week because Timberlake was spotted out, about and looking VERY cozy with actress Alisha Wainwright late last month during an evening in New Orleans.

With photos online of Timberlake holding Wainwright’s hand, and rumors of an affair floating all around, Timberlake addressed this scandal yesterday via Instagram.

"A few weeks ago I displayed a strong lapse in judgment — but let me be clear — nothing happened between me and my costar," wrote Timberlake, as you can see below.

He added:

"I drank way too much that night and I regret my behavior. I should have known better.

"This is not the example I want to set for my son. I apologize to my amazing wife and family for putting them through such an embarrassing situation, and I am focused on being the best husband and father I can be."

Other sources have backed up what Timberlake says here, confirming that there’s no romantic relationship between Timberlake and Wainwright.

Case seemingly closed, right?

Not a great look for JT and likely not a great reaction on Biel’s part to her husband’s transgressions, but this is just their business at this point, right?

WRONG, believes Williams.

Stating that things must be "Hell at home" for Biel and Timberlake, Williams went on to say that Biel probably "grabbed [Justin] by the scruff of his neck and said you better get out there and say something.

"Which is only making it a bigger situation than it was. I had forgotten."

At this, Wendy’s studio audience clapped in unison, prior to Williams saying that Timberlake barely had anything to apologize for.

"There’s nothing wrong with a hand on the knee sometimes," she said about a married man, adding that Justim’s mea culpa only shed "more light to the fact your marriage must be in scrambles right now."

It’s probably not in the best place, that’s a safe assumption.

But then Williams took her hot take to a scalding and insulting level, inappropriately saying that Biel is a total bore who seems like a bad match for her outgoing man.

"They look good together, but I don’t really understand the appeal of Biel beyond a look," said Williams.

"I don’t see her being able to dance to his music or drink all night with him. Maybe too serious for him."

Williams, who we feel very safe assuming does not know Jessica Biel at all, is saying here that it appears as if she doesn’t dance around a lot…

… so of course Timberlake is gonna get close to another woman.

How can anyone argue with that logic, right?

Referring to Biel as "a lovely girl" who is also "very beautiful," Wendy concluded her condescending and absurd rant by saying she pictures Justin with someone who has "a little swivel in her step."

Biel has not yet spoken out about her husband’s actions.

But we really hope she soon tears Williams a giant new one.
